00028 void TPulseIsland::Reset(Option_t* o)
00029 {
00030   fTimeStamp = 0;
00031   fSamples.clear();
00032   //fClockTickInNs = 0.0;
00033   fBankName = "";

00036 // GetAmplitude()
00037 // -- Gets the amplitude of the pulse
00038 double TPulseIsland::GetAmplitude() const {
00039 
00040   if (TSetupData::Instance()->IsFast(fBankName))
00041     return GetFastPulseAmplitude();
00042   else
00043     return GetSlowPulseAmplitude();
00044 
00045 }
00046 
00047 // GetFastPulseAmplitude()
00048 // -- Gets the amplitude for the fast pulse
00049 // -- Anyone can play around with algorithms in here provided they are on their own branch
00050 double TPulseIsland::GetFastPulseAmplitude() const {
00051 
00052   double pedestal = GetPedestal(10);
00053   int peak_sample_element = GetPeakSample();
00054 
00055   return ( GetTriggerPolarity()*(fSamples.at(peak_sample_element) - pedestal) );
00056 }
00057 
00058 // GetSlowPulseAmplitude()
00059 // -- Gets the amplitude for the fast pulse
00060 // -- Anyone can play around with algorithms in here provided they are on their own branch
00061 double TPulseIsland::GetSlowPulseAmplitude() const {
00062 
00063   double pedestal = GetPedestal(10);
00064   int peak_sample_element = GetPeakSample();
00065 
00066   return ( GetTriggerPolarity()*(fSamples.at(peak_sample_element) - pedestal) );
00067 }

00069 // GetPulseHeight()
00070 // -- Gets the position of the peak from GetPeakSample() and then returns the pulse height
00071 double TPulseIsland::GetPulseHeight() const {
00072   
00073   double pedestal = GetPedestal(10);
00074   int peak_sample_element = GetPeakSample();
00075   /*  std::stringstream histname;
00076   histname << "waveform" << std::rand()%1000;
00077   TH1I* hWaveform  = GetPulseWaveform(histname.str().c_str(), histname.str().c_str()); // get the histogram for fitting purposes
00078 
00079   TF1* gaussian = new TF1("gaus", "[0]*TMath::Gaus(x, [1], [2], 0) + [3]", peak_sample_element-10, peak_sample_element+10);
00080   gaussian->SetParameter(0, -1000);
00081   gaussian->SetParameter(1, hWaveform->GetMean());
00082   gaussian->SetParameter(2, hWaveform->GetRMS());
00083   gaussian->FixParameter(3, pedestal);
00084                 
00085   gaussian->SetLineColor(kRed);
00086   gaussian->SetLineWidth(2);
00087   hWaveform->Fit("gaus", "QR");
00088   
00089   delete hWaveform;*/
00090   // Go through the samples and get the samples with the largest difference between it and the pedestal
00091   // (should take into account both positive and negative pulses)
00092 
00093   return ( GetTriggerPolarity()*(fSamples.at(peak_sample_element) - pedestal) );
00094 }
00095 
00096 // GetPulseTime()
00097 // -- Gets the position of the peak from GetPeakSample() and adds that number of elements to the time stamp
00098 // -- It also calibrates the time to ns using fClockTickInNs
00099 double TPulseIsland::GetPulseTime() const {
00100 
00101   return (fTimeStamp + GetPeakSample()) * GetClockTickInNs();
00102 }
00103 
00104 // GetPulseWaveform()
00105 // -- Fills a histogram with all the samples and returns it
00106 TH1I* TPulseIsland::GetPulseWaveform(std::string histname, std::string histtitle) const {
00107 
00108   TH1I* hWaveform = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 200,0,200);
00109 
00110   // Loop over the samples and fill the histogram
00111   for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = fSamples.begin(); sampleIter != fSamples.end(); sampleIter++) {
00112     hWaveform->Fill(sampleIter - fSamples.begin(), *sampleIter);
00113   }
00114 
00115   return hWaveform;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 // GetPeakSample()
00120 // -- Goes through the samples and finds the element with the largest difference from the pedestal
00121 //    so it should take into account both positive and negative pulses
00122 // -- It returns its position in the fSamples vector
00123 int TPulseIsland::GetPeakSample() const {
00124 
00125   double pedestal = GetPedestal(10);
00126   int trigger_polarity=GetTriggerPolarity();
00127   int peak_sample_value = 0;
00128   int peak_sample_pos = 0;
00129 
00130   /*  if (fBankName == "CaUH"){
00131     printf("Bank Name: %s\n", fBankName.c_str());
00132     printf("Trigger Pol: %d, Board Pol: %d, Pedestal %f\n", trigger_polarity, board_polarity, pedestal);
00133   }
00134   */
00135   for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = fSamples.begin(); sampleIter != fSamples.end(); sampleIter++) {
00136     
00137     int this_height = trigger_polarity*(*(sampleIter) - pedestal);
00138     if ( this_height > peak_sample_value ) {
00139       peak_sample_value = this_height;
00140       peak_sample_pos = sampleIter - fSamples.begin();
00141     }
00142     //    if (fBankName == "CaUH")
00143     //      printf("Current Samples: %d, Current Height: %d, Peak Height: %d\n", *(sampleIter), this_height, peak_sample_value);
00144   }
00145   //    if (fBankName == "CaUH" && peak_sample_value < 1140)
00146   //      printf("Final Peak Height: %d\n", peak_sample_value);
00147 
00148 
00149   return peak_sample_pos;
00150 }
